item.description:
Get out on the water for fun and fitness!
Ever wonder what it is like to glide across the top of the water? Cutting through the ocean as you take in some of the north shore’s most scenic settings. Little Harbor Boathouse in Marblehead offers a unique opportunity to take to the sea.

Be introduced to the sport of sliding seat Olympic rowing.
You will learn the basics of the stroke and build your skills.
Classes take place in individual and two person rowing boats.
Each session runs six weeks with two 1 1/2 hour classes/week.


Mon/Wed & Tues/Thurs classes
Pick the time that works for you:
5:30 - 7 a.m.; 7:30 - 9 a.m.; 9:30 - 11 a.m.; 6 - 7:30 p.m.

Rolling Registrations: start as soon as you can!

For more information, pricing and on-line registration:
http://www.rowingforall.com/little-harbor-boathouse/adult-rowing-program/

Rowing classes at Little Harbor Boathouse Open Water Rowing & Paddling Center run all summer and into the fall too!

group.name: Community Rowing & Paddling on Boston's North Shore Meetup

item.name: Adult Starter Rowing: Tues/Thurs Classes
